hjz_zork

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.EventHandler

  • class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventHandler class defines all the triggerable events that the .Zork file is expected to include
    Version:
    1.0, 11/05/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko
